phones.name: Galaxy S8
phones.description: Samsung announced the Samsung Galaxy S8 and Samsung Galaxy S8+ smartphones on March 29, 2017. It features an iris scanner, which was not present on the Galaxy S7 phones.

phones.name: Galaxy S7
phones.description: Samsung announced the Samsung Galaxy S7 and Samsung Galaxy S7+ smartphones on March 29, 2016. It features an iris scanner, which was not present on the Galaxy S6 phones.
